tags: Electrical measuring and testing equipment and accessories
full_summary:
**Request for Proposal (RFP)**

**Project Title:** Acquisition of Ohmmeter, Blasting

# Project Overview
The Department of National Defence is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) to procure 150 units of Ohmmeter, Blasting (also known as Field Circuit Tester) for the first year, with optional quantities of up to 75 units over four (4) periods.

**Scope of Work:**

* Deliverance of the instrument to the Department of National Defence: 25 CFSD Montreal, 6363 Notre Dame St. E, Montreal, Quebec, H1N 1V9, within 90 calendar days from contract award.
* The Crown retains all rights to negotiate with suppliers on this procurement.

**Tender Requirements:**

* The RFP documents and specifications can be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).

**Important Dates:**

* Tender Closing Date: 2023-11-06 14:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2023-11-06
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None

**Contact Information:**

* Erica Langwa, (Contact Name)
* Phone: (343) 571-9957
* Email: [Erica.Langwa@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Erica.Langwa@forces.gc.ca)
* Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A0K2, Canada

**Attachments:**

Please download the following attachments for reference:

* RFP - Ohmmeter, Blasting (English)
* Amendment 1 (English)
* Amendment 2 (English)
* RFP - Ohmmètre, dynamitage (French)
* Modification 1 (French)
* Modification 2 (French)

**Certifications and Trade Agreements:**
Successfully bid contracts need to comply with the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
